hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #an Ice Trap# and #an Ice Trap#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Bottom of the Well#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Spooky Mask# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Kokiri Sword#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

GC (Maze).text: Did you know that ReDead won't attack if you walk very slowly?

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #3# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #an Ice Trap# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a spider under a #crate in the crater# holds #Farore's Wind#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Kokiri Sword#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: Did you know that you can access the Fire Temple boss door without dropping the pillar by using the Hover boots?

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Mask of Truth# can be found in #the Haunted Wasteland#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Field# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #deep in the wasteland# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #an Ocarina# can be found in #Goron City#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #4# major items.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #4# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found #outside Ganon's Castle#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Hover Boots#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Nocturne of Shadow# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #an Ice Trap# and #a Recovery Heart#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.
